name: Ricverse RPG
description:
It's RPG  Making Time!

Just a fun RPG prototype to try out RPG Maker. Made mostly during live streams with the community ;)

There's no much story yet, the focus is mainly on the gameplay!

Tileset  are from    Time Fantasy.

The combat is based on the    Chrono Engine  from  MogHunter.

A variety of plugins from Yanfly are used.
